name: Funky Monkey Kid
overview: Play as Funky Monkey Kid to try and free Funky Kung from the Baddie by collecting 4 keys in a row to unlock the cage. (From experience, it is easier to use the M key for jumping on real NEXT hardware) Move left to right and jump up to hold onto vines. You can only hold onto single vines for about 5 seconds but you can hold onto the double vines indefinately. Jump into the air to jump over the crocs, but beware of the birds. You can not move past a croc or bird so must navigate around them. Jump for the plum to knock it loose to kill crocs and birds underneath you.
